short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blackout blocked words from the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a list of words or phrases and any sentences containing those words/phrases will be blacked out on all websites. The goal is to prevent seeing spoilers or specific terms you want to avoid while browsing.
